lead_paragraph: Phillip Hughes would not have been sufficiently protected from the ball that struck and killed him during a cricket match 18 months ago even if he had been wearing the highest-standard helmet, a report into the Australian's death said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Safer Helmet Would Not Have Saved Hughes-Report
headline.main: Safer Helmet Would Not Have Saved Hughes-Report

snippet: Phillip Hughes would not have been sufficiently protected from the ball that struck and killed him during a cricket match 18 months ago even if he had been wearing the highest-standard helmet, a report into the Australian's death said on Wednesday...
